text: ke’alahimi behonechi chirota lezebikilachewi፡፡ ‘amele met’ifo libe derek’imi behoniki noro kezuriyahi betebetenu neberi፡፡ ke’inerisumi yik’iri beli፡፡ le’inerisumi mihiretini leminilachewi፡፡ benegerumi hulu amakirachewi፡፡ k’urit’i hasabimi baderegihi gize be’alahi layi temeka፡፡ alahi berisu layi temekiwochini yiwedalina፡፡
